column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'd heard so many good things about this place
column2: so I was super excited to try it.  The tapas were insanely delicious
column3: and came out super quickly - the fried chicken
column5: and the scallops empanada were some of my favorites.  A friend recommended the sangria
column6: but it didn't live up the hype - a bit watery and not enough alcohol.  I will definitely come back - this is a great place to go with a group and try a bunch of different things on the extensive menu - but I'll order beer or wine instead.
